resources:
Friends Quiz Enter your name Name is empty. Please enter your name on the top of the screen and click Submit. In question you did not choose the answer. How good do you know FRIENDS?
1 What is Monica\'s biggest pet peeve? Toast crumbs in the butter dish Animals dressed as humans. // correct answer Monkey crap on the furniture Socks and sandals together
2 What phenomenon scares the bejeezus out of Chandler? Michael Flatley, Lord of the Dance! // correct answer Neck beards Schreiners Cleaned house
3 Monica and Ross have a grandmother who died. What was the grandmother\'s name? Adelia Nana Althea // correct answer Alma
4 Every week, the TV Guide comes to Chandler and Joey\'s apartment. What name appears on the address label? Chendler Bing Joey Bing Chanandelor Bong // correct answer Monica Geller
5 What is the name of Chandler\'s father\'s Las Vegas all-male burlesque? Viva Las Gaygas // correct answer Male Viva Las Vegas Burlesqe in Vegas Moulin Rude
6 What was Monica\'s nickname when she was a field-hockey goalie? Roly poly goalie Big fat goalie // correct answer Slow monkey
7 Rachel favorite movies are? Trainspotting Dangerous Liaisons // correct answer Another Forever Weekend at Bernie\'s // correct answer
8 What is Joey\'s favorite food? Spagettie Sandwiches // correct answer Pizza Hot-dog
9 Monica categorizes her towels. How many categories are there? Enter number
10 Joey had an imaginary childhood friend. His name was? Mike Tom Alex Maurice // correct answer
Submit Reset
, your score is You don\'t know much about Friends. Good Job! Congratulations! You have good knowledge about Friends.
